name: places/ChIJZ0UYf1rafkcRK5LPtNmZe40
formattedAddress: Via Giovanni Anghinoni, 10, 35121 Padova PD, Italy

plusCode.compoundCode: CV5H+4G Padua, Province of Padua, Italy

adrFormatAddress: Via Giovanni Anghinoni, 10, 35121 Padova PD, Italy

editorialSummary.text: Sleek, warm rooms & suites in a chic spa hotel featuring a laid-back bar & a gym.

text.text:
This hotel was not our first choice for our stay in Padua but after some searches, we opted to be here. We never regretted.
Place is well-situated in the heart of the city-center - - a walking distance from all that we wanted to go in Padua.
The hotel was also clean and our room was neat. The wellness area (specifically the Spa and Jacuzzi) was scheduled privately. Breakfast was great, too.
Service was great and Alexandrina is highly commendable. Great Customer-Service.
I highly recommend the place and we‘ll be staying there again in our next visit. Kudos!

text.text:
Great hotel, with lovely and caring staff plus a wonderful SPA.
I have booked the SPA only, for my partner's birthday, however together with 1,5 hr private SPA, the guests are also given a complimentary room for 3 hours in total.
Towels, bath robes, sleepers and toiletries are all provided by the lovely hotel in the heart of Padua, making our afternoon a little bit different! Thank you

originalText.text:

I have booked the SPA only, for my partner's birthday, however together with 1,5 hr private SPA, the guests are also given a complimentary room for 3 hours in total.

text.text:
The first thing I’d like to highlight is the reception of us un the hotel. All the staff, including the young boy and the guy in the night was adorable, kind and and helpful. The second guy helped us with the heating in the room remotely, so that worked finally. The receptionist gave us a free upgrade od the room to a suite that was available, and that was a surprise.

The spa is top notch with private 1,5 hrs for every room. That is bull’s eye and the best option to get relaxed. We used it twice and got ourselves warm after long day of sightseeing.

The breakfast tasty with hot and qualitative scrambled eggs which I am really sensitive about. We received the Café from express machine with oat and soia milk to choose made by the barista. That is another of the factors that let us rate this hotel 10/10. We will definitely know where to book our stay if we are around Padua once again.

The room were tidy, and the towels were changed during the stay. There was an illy coffee machine in each room.

The location of the hotel is great, close to the main piazzas, railway station, St. Antonio’s Basilica and Scrovegni Chapel.

text.text: What a surprise! The number of reviews here are not huge, and I wasn't expecting much. I was wrong! The hotel has a beautiful style, the personnel is amazing, the room is comfortable and quiet, the breakfast is of very good quality and they do everything to make you feel welcome and comfortable! I regret not having booked for a couple of days more. They have an OK gym but the spa is just amazing (use of spa is complimentary for guests), huge and with a lot of things and comfort. By far one of the best -  if not the best - overall experience in a hotel (better than higher ranking ones). Highly recommended!

By far one of the best -  if not the best - overall experience in a hotel (better than higher ranking ones). Highly recommended!

text.text: Great location. We walked from the train station but the bus/metro can take you straight there. You can walk or take public transportation to all the main attractions in Padova. The room was spectacular- most comfortable bed and pillows. Relaxing mood lighting. Clean bathroom. The breakfast was good- illy coffee was yummy! The hotel staff was extremely helpful. The best part of course is with our room, we get to book a complimentary 1.5 hour private time in their spa area with jacuzzi, sauna, Turkish baths, sensory relaxation area, etc. So worth the money. We wish we stayed there longer! Thank you for an amazing, relaxing stay!
